item.title: Reading| Nonparametric binary regression using a Gaussian process prior
item.description: Let’s discuss this paper Choudhuri, N., Ghosal, S., & Roy, A. (2007). Nonparametric binary regression using a Gaussian process prior. Statistical Methodology, 17. 1. Problem Setup Consider a binary classification probem given by $$ p(x) = P(Y = 1|X=x). $$ This problem commonly occurs in many fields of application, such as medical and spatial statics. Traditionally, we would model this problem as $$ p(x) = H(\eta(x)), $$ where $H$ is commonly choosen as a cdf, called the link function, and $\eta$ can be choosen parametrically or nonparametrically.
